name: a Darkened Death
description: in this game, you will play as Thomas Doe, a worker of a company name Petey's Building (odd name i know) has to be in a nightshift with his friends because his boss dislikes them, Tom then had a coversation with his friend Joey who had a problem of working in a nightshift, then something broke in the hallway, Tom decides to check to see what happened, and this...is the beginning of the journey....of horror. this is in early stages, i might put in some finishing touches and i'll be done with it.
